Here’s an example that changes the border radius of an `img` element. ```xml Movie 1 ``` ### Values for border-radius There are four ways to designate the border-radius style as a 4-tuple: - `border-radius: X1 X2 X3 X4`—Where X1 is applied to the top-left corner, X2 is applied to the top-right corner, X3 is applied to the bottom-right corner, and X4 is applied to the bottom-left corner. - `border-radius: X1 X2 X3`—Where X1 is applied to the top-left corner, X2 is applied to the top-right and bottom-left corners, and X3 is applied to the bottom-right corner. - `border-radius: X1 X2`—Where X1 is applied to the top-left and bottom-right corners, and X2 is applied to the top-right and bottom-left corners. - `border-radius: X1`—Where X1 is applied to each corner. ### Elements that Use border-radius - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/card] - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/heroimg] - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/img] - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/monogram] - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/ratingcard] - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/reviewcard] - [doc://com.apple.TVML/documentation/TVML/textbadge]
